attributes.action: pass an act of parliament requiring all schools and colleges to teach all pupils British History. This sector of the curriculum should teach pupils the traditional history of Britain and it's customary ways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that under the banner of multiculturalism, that too much of Britain's traditional history, culture and identity is been eroded away.

This is causing much confusion, especially amongst young Britain's growing up today.

We believe that all children growing up today should have an option which takes them away from confusion, and instead, an entrance into the fascinating history of this nation. This will not only from violence and danger, but into a fascinating world of education, knowledge and discovery.

This history of Britain course should be available to all adults as well.
